summary: A team of scientists go to a nuclear mining facility to investigate a possible meltdown and instead find a large amount of cloned dinosaurs.
cast: John Savage|Cliff De Young|Don Stroud|Rick Dean|Ryan Thomas Johnson|Arabella Holzbog|Miguel A. Núñez Jr.|Neith Hunter|Guy Boyd|Michael McDonald|Christopher Darga|Jason Adelman|William G. Clark|John Davis Chandler|Christopher Murphy|Rodman Flender
title: Carnosaurios II
